headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid NDSN and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: What a brutal six months it’s been for Nordson. The stock has dropped 27.9% and now trades at $185.50, rattling many shareholders. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
